org.restlet.engine.util

Class ChildContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Context
      • org.restlet.engine.util.ChildContext

  • public class ChildContext
extends Context
    Context based on a parent component's context but dedicated to a child Restlet, typically to an application.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel
